title: Tears, Records, Bunny-Hops and Batman Glasses: The Stories that Defined the Tour de France
content:
From Cavendish's 35th to high-speed bunny-hops, to Jorgensen's MVP ride and Girmay's breakthrough, here are the best moments of a Tour de France that never stopped delivering.

Read the full article at Tears, Records, Bunny-Hops and Batman Glasses: The Stories that Defined the Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
